shapes.init_eqs_str: (function(){a['i'] = 0; a['k1'] = 0; a['zmax'] = 0; a['speed'] = 0; a['z'] = 0; a['out'] = 0; a['i']=0; for(var mdparser_idx430=0;mdparser_idx430<1024;mdparser_idx430++){a['z']=(randint(1)+0.1); a['megabuf'][Math.floor((a['i']+2))]=a['z']; a['megabuf'][Math.floor(a['i'])]=div((randint(1)-0.5),a['z']); a['megabuf'][Math.floor((a['i']+1))]=div((randint(1)-0.5),a['z']); a['i']+=3;}}());
